Detailed Description

The required base-class from which all TTBlue objects must inherit. This object is the primary base-class for all TTBlue objects, including TTObject. It does not define any core audio, parameter, or other high-level functionality. For these refer to TTObject and TTAudioObject.

static T TTElement::limit_max ( T  value,
T  high_bound 
) [inline, static]

A fast routine for clipping a number to a maximum range. The bottom end of the range is not checked. This routine does not use branching.

static T TTElement::limit_min ( T  value,
T  low_bound 
) [inline, static]

A fast routine for clipping a number on it's low range. The high end of the range is not checked. This routine does not use branching.

Definition at line 157 of file TTElement.h.

template<class T>
static T TTElement::onewrap ( T  value,
T  low_bound,
T  high_bound 
) [inline, static]

A fast routine for wrapping around the range once. This is faster than doing an expensive module, where you know the range of the input will not equal or exceed twice the range.
